Developer Terms of Use
des:
The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.
Providing real-time support to patients through Artificial Intelligence (AI) Technology 
Canna Buddy ™ will speak to the patients in Real-Time answering their questions in an educational and empathic manner. Canna Buddy will be able to affect change in the ever-evolving Medical Cannabis and C B D Industry. It is imperative that patients have access to reliable information and the Canna Buddy is the interactive tool for them to utilize. At the end of the day, it is very important to support these patients as many of them have unmet medical needs and need proper support
